Package com.scooterframework.cache

Interface Summary
Cache Cache interface defines methods of a cache store.
CacheProvider CacheProvider interface defines common methods of a cache provider.
 

Class Summary
AbstractCacheProvider AbstractCacheProvider class provides common methods of a cache provider.
CacheKey CacheKey class
CacheProviderUtil CacheProviderUtil class
CacheStatisticsConstats CacheStatisticsConstats class defines common statistics properties of a cache.
DefaultCacheStore DefaultCacheStore class provides convenient access to default cache.
NamedCurrentThreadCache NamedCurrentThreadCache provides a named cache for current request thread.
